request.description:
Country List is used in many places of user interface, like search filter, hotel list, search results and etc.


List of returned parameters in `data` parameter
 

**RESPONSE parameters**|**Required**|**Type**|**Acceptable values**|**Description**
:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:
countries|+|Array of Country| |Country List

response.name: Reference - Currency List

item.name: Hotel Related Info
Hotels List - List of All Hotels and Hotel Conditions

request.description:
Base information of hotels

|    Fields                   |    Type                           |    Required    |    Description                                  |
|-----------------------------|-----------------------------------|----------------|-------------------------------------------------|
|    id                       |    Long                           |    +           |    Hotel   ID                                   |
|    hotel_type_id            |    Integer                        |    +           |    Hotel   type ID                              |
|    city_id                  |    Integer                        |    +           |    City   ID                                    |
|    longitude                |    Float                          |    -           |    Longitude                                    |
|    latitude                 |    Float                          |    -           |    Latitude                                     |
|    address                  |    Array   of Name                |    -           |    Hotel   address                              |
|    check_in                 |    Array   of CheckInOut          |    +           |    Check   in rules                             |
|    check_out                |    Array   of CheckInOut          |    +           |    Checkout   rules                             |
|    meal_options             |    Array   of MealOption          |    +           |    Meal   options                               |
|    cancellation_policies    |    Array of CancellationPolicy    |    +           |    Cancelation rules                            |
|    guest_age_rules          |    Array of GuestAgeRule          |    -           |    Rules for guest ages                         |
|    star_id                  |    Integer                        |    +           |    ID of   the Star                             |
|    extra_bed_costs          |    Array   of ExtraBedCost        |    -           |    List   of additional bed prices              |
|    names                    |    Array   of Name                |    +           |    List   of names in Array View                |
|    description              |    Array   of Name                |    -           |    Description   (with using HTML)              |
